察.definition: to examine; to inquire; to observe; to inspect; to look into; obvious; clearly evident

察合臺.definition: Chagatai (died 1241), a son of Genghis Khan

察哈爾.definition: Chahar Province (former province in North China existing from 1912-1936)

察哈爾右翼中旗.pinyin: chá hā ěr yòu yì zhōng qí
察哈爾右翼中旗.definition: Chahar Right Center banner or Caxar Baruun Garyn Dund khoshuu in Ulaanchab 烏蘭察布|乌兰察布[Wu1 lan2 cha2 bu4], Inner Mongolia

察哈爾右翼前旗.pinyin: chá hā ěr yòu yì qián qí
察哈爾右翼前旗.definition: Chahar Right Front banner or Caxar Baruun Garyn Ömnöd khoshuu in Ulaanchab 烏蘭察布|乌兰察布[Wu1 lan2 cha2 bu4], Inner Mongolia

察哈爾右翼後旗.pinyin: chá hā ěr yòu yì hòu qí
察哈爾右翼後旗.definition: Chahar Right Rear banner or Caxar Baruun Garyn Xoit khoshuu in Ulaanchab 烏蘭察布|乌兰察布[Wu1 lan2 cha2 bu4], Inner Mongolia

察布查爾.definition: Qapqal Xibe Autonomous County in Ili Kazakh Autonomous Prefecture 伊犁哈薩克自治州|伊犁哈萨克自治州[Yi1 li2 Ha1 sa4 ke4 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Xinjiang

察布查爾縣.definition: Qapqal Xibe Autonomous County in Ili Kazakh Autonomous Prefecture 伊犁哈薩克自治州|伊犁哈萨克自治州[Yi1 li2 Ha1 sa4 ke4 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Xinjiang

察布查爾錫伯自治縣.pinyin: chá bù chá ěr xī bó zì zhì xiàn
察布查爾錫伯自治縣.definition: Qapqal Xibe Autonomous County in Ili Kazakh Autonomous Prefecture 伊犁哈薩克自治州|伊犁哈萨克自治州[Yi1 li2 Ha1 sa4 ke4 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Xinjiang

察爾汗鹽湖.definition: Qarhan Salt Lake in west Qinghai

察看.definition: to watch; to look carefully at

察覺.definition: to sense; to perceive; to become aware of; to detect

察言觀色.definition: to weigh up sb's words and observe their facial expression (idiom); to discern what sb thinks from his body language

察訪.definition: to make an investigative visit; to go and find out from the source
